Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? You heard a strange sound? Oh,
sorry about that!
<PAGE>
I guess I woke you up. It's another of
my jobs. Forgive me.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, I say job... it's more like a
hobby.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I deliver the <RED>newspapers</RED> for the town. I
put it in that <RED>mailbox</RED> there.
<PAGE>
Do you want to hear about your <RED>mailbox</RED>?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You already know about mailboxes? Hardly
rocket science, is it! Newspapers come
on the same day each week.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'd better be getting on, anyway. I'll
see you again soon.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We're going to be working together a lot
from now on so let me say hello again
properly. It's great to meet you.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I didn't get a chance to give you the
details on <RED>shipping</RED> the other day, so
I can explain it now if you like?
<PAGE>
Do you want to hear about shipping now?

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay. I'll tell you more in front of
the <BLUE>shipping bin</BLUE>. Let's go over there.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's all I needed to say. Have a good
day again today, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You do? That's great. Very trustworthy!
<PAGE>
That's all I needed to say, then. Have a
good day, <MYNAME>.
